text: Kristine Hanson (born September 23, 1951 in Illinois) is an American television broadcaster who also was Playboy magazine's Playmate of the Month for the September 1974 issue. Her centerfold was photographed by David Chan. She was previously the host of DIY Network's The Dirt on Gardening. Hanson has been the meteorologist on KTXL and KCRA in Sacramento, California, on KTVU, KGO, and KRON in San Francisco, and KZST in Santa Rosa, California. She is currently a meteorologist on KOVR in Sacramento, California. She won an Emmy Award and a first place award for American Women in Radio and Television. She holds communication studies and theatre arts degrees from California State University, Sacramento and a degree in meteorology from San Francisco State University. ==See also== * List of people in Playboy 1970-1979 ==References== == External links == * Category:1970s Playboy Playmates Category:Weather presenters Category:1951 births Category:People from Illinois Category:Living people Category:Television anchors from Sacramento, California Category:American women television journalists
title: Kristine Hanson
